root.name: Protocols SDK
root.description: Software Development Kit for the 'Protocols' programming environment
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 4.1.2.0 Date 2014-08-04 17:21:54 - Version 4.1.1.0 Date 2014-07-29 15:17:37 * Fixed the "Subtract ROI" block not working properly in 3D * Fixed the "Erode ROI" block not working properly for zero-value radii - Version 4.1.0.0 Date 2014-07-24 19:16:44 Major code refactoring: better separation between the engine (Protocols SDK) and the graphical user interface (Protocols) - Version 4.0.2.0 Date 2014-07-23 13:02:04 Workflow interruption is now correctly handled - Version 4.0.1.0 Date 2014-07-23 00:05:07 * Updated to EzPlug 3.5 * Better error handling * Improved block collapsing - Version 4.0.0.0 Date 2014-07-09 19:26:08 * New feature: inner workflows and loops can now be collapsed while their exposed variables remain visible and linkable! (contributed by Ludovic Laborde) * Fixed and cleaned ROI erosion and dilation in 3D - Version 3.0.1.0 Date 2014-06-17 18:32:10 * Fixed issue when drag'n'dropping XML files into the Protocols interface * Improved the block renaming interface * Fixed an issue causing blocks at location (0,0) not to allow resizing anymore - Version 3.0.0.0 Date 2014-06-17 14:50:16 New major release, thanks to Ludovic Laborde! What's new: blocks can now be selected, moved around by group, copy/pasted inside a protocol or to another protocol, and inner workflows can be deleted without losing the inside - Version 2.10.1.0 Date 2014-05-21 19:16:19 Update by Ludovic Laborde * Updated to Icy 1.5 * Fixed drag'n'drop issue from the search bar - Version 2.10.0.0 Date 2014-05-16 21:19:42 Updates by Ludovic Laborde * Blocks can be renamed by the user (double-click on block title) * Improved drag-n-drop support from search results - Version 2.9.2.0 Date 2014-05-12 20:31:59 * Fixed flickering issue when scrolling through large protocols * Detect missing variables when loading links - Version 2.9.0.0 Date 2014-04-24 18:47:06 Numerous bug fixes and improvements to the graphical interface - Version 2.8.2.0 Date 2014-02-20 21:53:21 * New: ErodeROI block * Minor polishing - Version 2.8.1.2 Date 2014-01-27 13:57:54 Custom error message when trying to install plugins using Icy4Eclipse D/R - Version 2.8.1.1 Date 2014-01-10 18:37:46 Minor addition to the previous update (ROI can be dilated individually) - Version 2.8.1.0 Date 2014-01-10 18:27:46 Dilate ROI is now accessible programmatically (i.e. via plugins & scripts) - Version 2.8.0.0 Date 2013-12-23 19:23:51 * Block sizes are now properly reloaded from XML * Fixed an issue in the "Translate ROI" block - Version 2.7.1.0 Date 2013-12-18 18:23:33 Updated ROI blocks: - Subtract ROI works in all dimensions - Dilate ROI has a radius along X,Y,Z - new: Translate ROI block - Version 2.7.0.0 Date 2013-11-15 21:43:55 Updated to Icy 1.4.2.0: - removed deprecated calls - fixed 'Merge ROI' block - fixed 'Subtract ROI' block - new 'Dilate ROI' block - Version 2.6.4.0 Date 2013-11-07 19:44:27 Reload dynamic variables with a type selection model (don't know of any other use cases for now) - Version 2.6.3.0 Date 2013-11-05 22:45:33 Fixed an issue in the "Crop sequence to ROI" that fixes the latest Icy update - Version 2.6.2.0 Date 2013-10-24 12:04:38 New block: Show ImagePlus - Version 2.6.1.0 Date 2013-10-14 15:17:41 Fixed issue causing blocks requiring the EDT not loading anymore (introduced in v.2.6.0.0) - Version 2.6.0.0 Date 2013-10-12 18:11:25 Missing plugins are now all fetched and installed at once, whatever the version of the protocol (a single reload is much more efficient, should reduce PerGenSpace usage) - Version 2.5.0.0 Date 2013-08-22 18:39:29 Fixed a long-lasting graphical issue when resizing blocks. Default size of components is now also respected - Version 2.4.14.0 Date 2013-07-30 17:34:45 Fixed an issue causing loops to fail executing (since 2.4.13.0) - Version 2.4.13.0 Date 2013-07-24 14:59:00 Minor improvement to the protocol's interruption process. - Version 2.4.12.0 Date 2013-07-22 19:19:20 Multiple (though minor) engine and GUI fixes - Version 2.4.11.0 Date 2013-07-12 13:47:31 Fixed block deletion routine failing or stalling the interface in some specific cases - Version 2.4.10.0 Date 2013-06-08 23:54:54 AddROIToSequence saves metadata to disk alongside the sequence - Version 2.4.9.2 Date 2013-05-21 15:27:51 Merged diverging versions 2.4.8.0 and 2.4.9.1 - Version 2.4.9.1 Date 2013-05-18 23:38:24 Missing file in the previous update - Version 2.4.9.0 Date 2013-05-18 23:36:02 * Updated to Icy 1.3.5.0 * Add ROI to Sequence: new option to replace existing ROI before adding new ones - Version 2.4.8.0 Date 2013-04-25 12:19:37 New block: Append file path - Version 2.4.7.0 Date 2013-04-17 18:29:30 * Stop saving the value of linked variables to XML (can be huge!) * Throw simpler error message when unable to load a variable from the store xml data. - Version 2.4.6.0 Date 2013-04-17 00:09:36 Fixed loading of dynamic output variables - Version 2.4.5.0 Date 2013-03-22 15:46:06 Fixed SequenceToFile block - Version 2.4.4.0 Date 2013-03-22 14:33:26 New block: sequence screenshot - Version 2.4.3.0 Date 2013-03-21 10:40:17 * CropSequenceToROI block should now support all ROI types * Indexer block displays an error message for invalid indexes * Folder loops are now case insensitive on the file extension parameter - Version 2.4.2.0 Date 2013-03-12 20:33:34 Improve block/protocol interruption from the user interface - Version 2.4.1.0 Date 2013-03-08 16:10:54 Renamed "dynamic" variables to "runtime" variables, and clarified methods to add such variables. - Version 2.4.0.0 Date 2013-03-08 15:05:17 New: runtime variables (can be added via the graphical user interface) Fixed an issue causing the Accumulator block not to reload correctly from XML - Version 2.3.3.0 Date 2013-02-28 18:13:30 Blocks is more permissive while loading protocols with errors (warnings go in the console) - Version 2.3.2.0 Date 2013-01-28 18:28:05 Fixed unlinking variables in bulk via VarList.clear() - Version 2.3.1.0 Date 2013-01-28 18:12:11 * All panels are now resizable by default. * Remove variables properly by unlinking them first - Version 2.3.0.0 Date 2013-01-24 18:08:48 New accumulator block (converts a list of variables into a single array) - Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2013-01-16 15:13:50 * Updated to Icy 1.3.0.0 * New "Sequence" menu for protocols - Version 2.1.1.0 Date 2013-01-10 16:53:04 Updated to EzPlug v.2.8.2.0 - Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2013-01-08 18:31:00 * Updated to EzPlug 2.8 * New IO blocks: file <=> path * (experimental) new block to call an ImageJ macro file (no output yet) - Version 2.0.1.0 Date 2012-12-12 20:15:32 Fixed bug when working with local blocks (not published online) - Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2012-12-07 17:42:11 * New graphical interface * ROI manipulation blocks * ImageJ compat blocks - Version 1.12.3.0 Date 2012-11-07 16:46:03 * Prevent risk of changing the type of a mutable value linked in an array loop * Removed unnecessary (and erratic) steps when loading protocols - Version 1.12.2.0 Date 2012-11-06 18:57:29 * Refresh state of exposed variables after linking / unlinking * Catch error when running an empty array loop - Version 1.12.1.0 Date 2012-10-31 19:41:13 New block: CropSequenceToROI - Version 1.12.0.1 Date 2012-10-31 17:30:37 Fixed jar export - Version 1.12.0.0 Date 2012-10-31 17:25:24 New: ROI management blocks - Version 1.11.4.0 Date 2012-10-24 16:10:45 Check for network connection when installing missing plugins - Version 1.11.3.0 Date 2012-10-24 15:50:16 * Fixed loading/saving of mutable variables * Fixed loading/saving of loop parameters - Version 1.11.2.0 Date 2012-10-24 13:57:02 Fixed a minor error while loading a protocol with a missing variable - Version 1.11.1.1 Date 2012-10-11 18:35:52 Re-upload jar file (weird progress bar issue with FileToSequence) - Version 1.11.1.0 Date 2012-10-11 17:15:32 new FolderLoop block (browses through all files of a folder, with or without extension) - Version 1.10.0.0 Date 2012-10-02 19:26:04 Updated to EzPlug 2.5.0.0 Display type selector of VarMutable outputs - Version 1.9.0.0 Date 2012-09-27 15:49:34 Reworked XML loading/saving strategy to support live plugin download and install - Version 1.8.0.1 Date 2012-09-26 16:59:15 Re-upload jar file (was including Protocols plug-in by mistake) - Version 1.8.0.0 Date 2012-09-26 16:19:55 * New BlocksML logic to load/save protocols * Variables can be tested for whether they are referenced by other variables within a workflow * Minor code improvements - Version 1.7.1.0 Date 2012-09-14 15:49:40 * Block menu: filter out loops from other blocks * WorkFlow extends Plugin * Adjusted BlockPanel's paint strategy (prepares for the upcoming SwingX update) * BlocksML: fixed causing BlocksML v2 not to load properly * BlocksML: catch error when creating blocks to help diagnosis * Fixed bug causing some links to be cut off on screenshot edges. - Version 1.7.0.0 Date 2012-09-06 16:26:59 * Revamped linking system (highlighting, deletion) * Improved graphical rendering quality - Version 1.6.0.0 Date 2012-08-30 15:45:13 * Ability to stop running protocols * Console messages more explicit (regarding elapsed time) - Version 1.5.2.0 Date 2012-08-09 11:46:08 Fixed bug causing inner workflows and loops to fail during insertion into a protocol and XML I/O - Version 1.5.1.0 Date 2012-08-07 19:01:17 Catch an error when downloading new plugins upon protocol loading (the protocol editor needs to be re-opened after installation) - Version 1.5.0.0 Date 2012-08-07 18:51:28 - Improved stability when new plug-ins are installed
- Fixed error messages not properly showing for several IO blocks - Version 1.4.2.0 Date 2012-08-06 18:15:29 New block: AppendText (appends any value to a text or sequence name) - Version 1.4.1.0 Date 2012-08-06 11:54:51 Fixed issue 70 (range loops not reloading correctly from xml) NOTE: protocols must be saved again to be reloaded correctly. Old protocols will keep showing the same error until they are saved again. - Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2012-08-03 12:02:10 WorkFlow does not extend Plugin anymore (in order for bug reports to work properly) => Loops menus must be generated manually => Plugin names in context menus have been adjusted - Version 1.3.1.0 Date 2012-07-17 19:32:03 * BlocksFinder: split "Blocks" menu into sub-menus of max. 15 items * new IO block: FilesToSequence (multiple files into a single sequence) - Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2012-07-12 14:45:01 * Upgraded to EzPlug 2.0 (Vars integration) * Adjust block title Previous changes in v.1.2: * Don't resize the variable name when resizing a panel * Resize the entire panel if a VarEditor requires so (as of Vars 1.4) * new: getContentsBoundingBox() * Adjust the label name in the drop-down menu depending on the type of plugin * Handle primitive types in XML - Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-07-09 18:44:14 * Fixed several interface bugs * Renamed some input blocks for easier reading - Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-07-06 12:05:53 First officially stable release ! Workflows can now be embedded into loops (useful for batch process) - Version 0.14.0.0 Date 2012-07-05 19:16:36 - Fixed issues in XML I/O - New: workflows can be embedded into larger workflows or loops (experimental) - Version 0.13.0.0 Date 2012-07-04 14:24:47 * Updated SequenceToFile block to work with Icy 1.2.6.0 (and to appear in IO submenu) * Fixed BlocksFinder not finding some blocks, and improved generation of menu labels from class names - Version 0.12.0.0 Date 2012-07-04 11:51:33 - Removed Float and FloatArray inputs - Display a message in the center of a workflow container to help the user create a first block - new I/O submenu - Version 0.11.0.0 Date 2012-07-03 18:52:52 - XML I/O reworked - GUI engine improvements - Version 0.9.9.9 Date 2012-07-02 20:22:54 Graphical interface is *much* faster and responsive - Version 0.9.9.8 Date 2012-07-02 17:19:37 * Updated to Vars v.1.3.3.0 * Fixed bugs in some drag'n'drop operations * Fixed XML I/O for Workflows and primitive arrays * Display block has now a mutable variable to allow pass-through links - Version 0.9.9.7 Date 2012-06-29 19:22:39 Fixed issue causing the right-click not to work - Version 0.9.9.6 Date 2012-06-29 19:08:00 * create blocks popup in a workflow pane given by a variable * block popup menu moved to instance field * fixed issue #64 (hiding exposed variables wasn't refreshing the panel) - Version 0.9.9.5 Date 2012-06-29 11:14:21 Fixed XML IO bugs - Version 0.9.9.4 Date 2012-06-28 17:06:05 Updated Blocks to Vars 1.3.0.0 (changes to VarMutableArray) - Version 0.9.9.3 Date 2012-06-24 23:12:53 Updated to Vars 1.2.0.0 WARNING: array input blocks now rely on native types. Blocks must be updated accordingly - Version 0.9.9.2 Date 2012-06-22 14:16:18 v.1.0-RC2 release. Major changes: - Main graphical interface moved to new "Protocols" plugin - Blocks becomes a library Engine changes: - fixed issue causing drag'n'drop to fail - fixed XML saving with inner workflows - fixed handling of VarExceptions - save confirmation dialog not shown when workflow is empty - Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-06-20 22:13:55
